item.description:
“A New Generation of Spike & Mike Animation” is a bold innovation in animation anthologies from the men behind the venerable SICK & TWISTED show. Though it’s filled with laughs and wildly entertaining, NEW GENERATION ANIMATION is absent the monocle-spinning gross-out gags of S&T, and rather focuses on the flat-out best, funniest, hippest, most sophisticated animated shorts the world has to offer. It’s a brain-slapping assortment of award-winning (and worthy) animated accomplishments from the top talents around the globe—quite possibly the most incredible animated shorts program ever seen.

If you get a free membership at http://www.goldstar.com they have half-price tickets right now for a double feature of New Generation at 7:30 pm plus Sick and Twisted at 9:30 pm. I am skipping Sick and Twisted because I don't find it entertaining, but you're welcome to stay for it. The "half-price" tickets are a total of $9 (they add a fee), otherwise it's $12 but that may be for just one of the two shows.

http://www.regenttheatre.com/details/a_new_generation_of_spike_mike_animation
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and will sit in the middle of the theater
item.name: Spike & Mike's Animation Festival at the Regent Theatre in Arlington
